scripts.vercel-build: git submodule update --init --recursive && npm install --workspaces && cross-env NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 npm --workspace istampit-web run build
scripts.lint:upgrade-eslint: npm install -D eslint@latest @eslint/config-array @eslint/object-schema && npm --workspace istampit-web install -D eslint@latest
